price: 29. Yalli ceelallo yoogore; agleh yan mari itta elle waa numuy naqasuh yanii kee cagalah num dubuk leh yan naqasul, a nammay massoowaa ceelalloh? (ma-massoowa). Yalli dudda-le fayla dubuk-le, wonna hinnay maggo mari keenik ma- yaaxiga.
arabic: ضَرَبَ ٱللَّهُ مَثَلٗا رَّجُلٗا فِيهِ شُرَكَآءُ مُتَشَٰكِسُونَ وَرَجُلٗا سَلَمٗا لِّرَجُلٍ هَلۡ يَسۡتَوِيَانِ مَثَلًاۚ ٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِۚ بَلۡ أَكۡثَرُهُمۡ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: ḍaraba al-lahu mathalan rajulan fīhi shurakāu mutashākisūna warajulan salaman lirajulin hal yastawiyāni mathalan al-ḥamdu lillahi bal aktharuhum lā yaʿlamūna
